channel.title: ::Donatorzone please help

item.title: ::Donatorzone please help
item.dc:creator: @ylly_powns ylly powns
item.description:
@ylly_powns wrote:

if(command.startsWith("donatorzone") && donator >= 1){ triggerTele(2956, 3506, 0); resetfollowers(); sM("Welcome to The donatorzone "+ playerName +" Chill here with other donators."); }

explained

U have to type ::donatorzone to go to the place u want. You can change the command to whatever u want.

This means that only the people that have the “donator = 1” status can teleport to the place…

This are the coords of the place where you are going to teleport. Find a place and type: “::Myposs” and see what the X and Y coords are. The X coord in the first and the Y coord in the 2st place…
U only have to change the 2956, 3506 to the X and Y coords u wish.

This is the text what it said when u teleport to the place… U can change it to whatever u want.

Search for private void customCommand(String command) { in ur client.java and then U see alot of commands. Under one of the commands add:

if(command.startsWith("donatorzone") && donator >= 1){ triggerTele(2956, 3506, 0); resetfollowers(); sM("Welcome to The donatorzone "+ playerName +" Chill here with other donators.");

Then save&close&compile!
Done!
If you have any qeustions or you get errors, Please just post…

Read full topic
